title: The Portland Trail Blazers Advance, Plus: Next-Round Predictions | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC discuss the Portland Trail Blazers' win over the Brooklyn Nets and what we can expect for their next matchup against the Memphis Grizzlies, with the eighth seed on the line (1:00). Then they break down the potential franchises that could see changes in the near future (12:40) and discuss the teams to keep an eye on as they move on to the next rounds (33:40).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O'Connor
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
